rows.label: qev030607_MSG0001
rows.name:
Nemard deserves strong and self-reliant woman.
Woman like Heptana.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG0002
rows.name: It is for best. If Nemard is happy, I am happy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG1001
rows.name: Oh, bother. I am out of yarn.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG1002
rows.name:
I swore I would tell him my feelings.
Swore once this was done. But now...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG1003
rows.name: I am fool. I should have prepared more carefully...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev030607_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Enneana what is troubling her.

rows.label: qev030607_JNK0020
rows.name: Inform

rows.label: qev030607_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Enneana that Nemard wishes to marry her.

rows.label: qev030607_MSG1004
rows.name: Hmm? Oh! You are friend of Nemard?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG1005
rows.name:
Then I cannot tell you my troubles. This is for...
No! I must say it to him![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG1006
rows.name: ...WHAAAT?! Nemard wants me to be his mate?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG1007
rows.name: Am I dreaming? Is this dream?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG1008
rows.name: Nemard wants me to be his mate?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG1009
rows.name: ...No. This is lie. Or joke.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG2001
rows.name:
I promised I would tell Nemard of my love.
Tell him once I finished my threadwork.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG2002
rows.name:
I knew he would not return his love. I did not care.
I needed him to know my heart.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG2003
rows.name:
But now he asks ME to be his mate? I am so happy,
it makes me afraid. Is this really truth?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_JNK0030
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev030607_SEL0031
rows.name: Promise Enneana that it is the truth.

rows.label: qev030607_JNK0040
rows.name: Tease

rows.label: qev030607_SEL0041
rows.name: Lie and say you made it all up.

rows.label: qev030607_MSG2004
rows.name: ...He has already started horn-ring of betrothal?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG2005
rows.name: Then I must complete this threadwork for him![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG2006
rows.name: What? WHAAAAT? Why would you tell such cruel lie?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG2007
rows.name: I knew in my heart. He could never love me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG2008
rows.name:
...Wait. THAT was lie? Nemard has started to make
horn-ring of betrothal?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG2009
rows.name:
You are cruel, Earth alien! Do not play with my heart.
Promise this is truth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG2010
rows.name:
...Then that is more reason to finish this threadwork.
Finish it for him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG2011
rows.name: I also wish to offer Nemard token of feelings.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG2012
rows.name: Will you help me? Will you find me lightweight pelts?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG2013
rows.name:
Three is all I need to finish my present.
Then I will give it to him. Along with my hand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG4001
rows.name: Please find three lightweight pelts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG4002
rows.name: I will use them to make perfect sash for Nemard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG4003
rows.name: I will use gift to show him how I feel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG3001
rows.name: Did you find lightweight pelts?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG3002
rows.name: Thank you. Now Nemard will know how I feel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG3003
rows.name:
Marriage is strange word on tongue.
So sweet. I feel tears inside me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG3004
rows.name:
You are friend of Nemard. Speak to me.
What kind of Prone do you think he is?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_JNK0050
rows.name: Be Positive

rows.label: qev030607_SEL0051
rows.name: Give a glowing impression of Nemard.

rows.label: qev030607_JNK0060
rows.name: Be Negative

rows.label: qev030607_SEL0061
rows.name: Give a critical impression of Nemard.

rows.label: qev030607_MSG3005
rows.name: I feel same. Still, others are harsh. Call him weak.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG3006
rows.name: But I know of no one else so kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG3007
rows.name:
Others all say same. He is Prone male who can't hunt.
Can't fight. That is no man at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG3008
rows.name:
But I know different. He is strong.
That is why he treats others with kindness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG3009
rows.name: When I was captive of Ganglion, I cried every day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG3010
rows.name:
But one day Nemard came. Gave me threadwork tools.
I not know where he found them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG3011
rows.name:
He must have risked much danger to gather those
tools and yarn. All for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG3012
rows.name:
He said he just wanted me to be happy.
Acted like getting tools was easiest thing in world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG3013
rows.name: I know of no one like Nemard. He is...the sun.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG3014
rows.name:
So I will be his mate. I expect rite of marriage will
take place soon. I hope you will attend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG5001
rows.name:
Nemard fought hard to win beast horn for ring.
All for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG5002
rows.name: When I saw it, I knew his feelings were true.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG5003
rows.name:
I am happy. Yet afraid. What can I do for him?
How can I offer comfort? Support?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG6001
rows.name:
Already, I am filled with happiness.
What happens when I put on ring?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG6002
rows.name: I am so happy it frightens me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG7001
rows.name: You are back! Good. Nemard and I have request.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030607_MSG7002
rows.name: He wants to ask you himself. I hope you will accept.[ST:wait ]
